text: The Elections Commission has decided to conduct the postal voting for the February 10 local government elections on 25th and 26th January, Elections Commissioner Mahinda Deshapriya said this morning at the Department of Government of Government Information.Postal ballot papers would be sent to the polling centers on the same day.Elections officials and Police personnel could cast their postal votes on 22nd January.The Elections Commission has decided to conduct the postal voting for the February 10 local government elections on 25th and 26th January, Elections Commissioner Mahinda Deshapriya said this morning at the Department of Government of Government Information.
